Question 91) Excavarán Plaza Ceremonial del Frontis North of Huaca de la luna Trujillo, FEB. 25 (Andean). Back cleaning Los Runos Del kettle colonial y of Los Excavaciones of Last Losa en huaca de la luna, this año interves la Plaza ceremonial del Frontis Norte, in where ubica la Gran facada del be archaeological ubillo, La Libertad, Infitaron Hoy Fuente Cultules. Después of several weeks of work, the material fuea drawee del archaeological site to be able to appreciate mejor la Extensión y form del patio that, segun las investigation, sirvió hace unos 1 500 as emphasis of extractions rituals.
El Codirector del Proyect Archaeological Huacas del Sol and La Luna, Ricardo Morales Gamarra, Sostvo that with the Zona Clean of Run, Los Visitors Concertion Truth. As a part, El Archaeologist Santiago Uceda, También Codirector del Proyecto, I say that Las Excavaciones will begin this año to determine what other elements componían dicha area area. “Hace Poco nos Sorprendió find a semicircular altar staggered. It was something that we did not expect. For so much, it is difficult to know that he is so hidden in the zone that we will explore ”, Señaló uceda a la Agencia Andina.
La Huaca de la Luna is located in the Trujillano District of Moche. It is a pyromid of adorned adobe, in sus murales, with impressive mythological imagenes, muchas of them in Alto Relieve.
The text presents information about a future excavation work of a Peruvian archaeological site. Your reading allows you to infer that
A) The Huaca de la luna pyramid was built during the Peruvian colonial period.
B) The archaeological site contains a very deteriorated semicircular altar.
C) The Huaca de la luna pyramid was built with ceramic.
D) The archaeological site has a courtyard that was the scene of rituals.
E) The archaeological site maintains rubble left by the moche civilization.
